column4: [  356.584738] usb 2-3: device not accepting address 5, error -62
[  356.584807] hub 2-0:1.0: unable to enumerate USB device on port 3
sorry for flooding
i have tried all 4 of them
just so you know, i had jaunty installed after it was released and everything worked smoothly, then updated to karmic and still everything was working just fine
like a month ago, after an update they stopped working
then i downgraded to jaunty again b/c of sound issues
yes, everything worked just fine before
i only have jaunty installed
i dont think its the devices though, all of them worked before and none is working now, and ive tried in all ports
Have you got any other liveCD?
the mouse will even blink
no, i dont... is there something else i can try?
My soundcard also deffected by one moment to the secound. So i want to sure if it isn't a hardware problem
everything worked perfectly on this laptop out of the box when i installed jaunty... lost sound with karmic, but usb was still working fine
sound is back now i put jaunty back, but usb is not
Try the karmic again (as a live cd). If it works, there is an unoffical upgrade that makes the sound much better
you experienced a cracking noise dont you?
no, sound was completely gone
i'd rather keep jaunty, sound is not an issue anymore, but i'd like to make usb devices work
Well i don't have any further idea right now
Maybe someone else can help you
okay, thanks for your time!
